p: Patterned indium tin oxide (ITO, 3 × 3 cm 2) with a sheet resistance of 13–15 Ω/sq was purchased from Ossila. PbI 2 (99%), ZnI 2 (98%), and 3-CPACl (98%) were purchased from Sigma-Aldrich. Methylamine hydrobromide (MABr, 98%) and Formamidine hydroiodide (FAI, 98%) were purchased from TCI. N, N-Dimethylformamide (DMF) was purchased from Biosolvie Chimie SARL.
